about.title: About Me
about.AboutMe: Hi! I'm Xagly, a full-stack web developer with a creative mindset and a growing focus on user experience.  I recently completed two courses in Google UX Design Professional Certificate, Foundations of UX and Empathise, Define & Ideate, which have deepened my approach to building accessible, user-centred digital products.  I enjoy blending code with creativity, from interactive design to electronic music and visual experiments.  My goal is to craft experiences that are both functional and meaningful across platforms and audiences.
